meanings.sent1: The pizza tasted cardboardy, like it was made from a box.
meanings.sent2: The cardboardy texture of the paper made it easy to tear.
meanings.sent3: The cardboardy sound of the door closing made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: Her voice sounded cardboardy, lacking warmth and depth.
meanings.sent5: The cardboardy smell of the old book brought back memories of school days.

meanings.definition: Having the texture or taste of cardboard.
meanings.sent1: The soup was so cardboardy that no one wanted a second bite.
meanings.sent2: The cardboardy feel of the fabric made it uncomfortable to wear.
meanings.sent3: His attempt at cooking turned out cardboardy, much to his disappointment.
meanings.sent4: The cardboardy taste of the cereal reminded her of breakfasts at camp.
meanings.sent5: The cardboardy texture of the cake made it hard to swallow.
